caption:
This photograph captures a riverside scene featuring environmental degradation. In the foreground, a wide, muddy brown river flows horizontally across the image. On the far bank of the river, a steep hillside cluttered with scattered debris and garbage slopes down to the water's edge. The debris includes various items that seem out of place in a natural setting, such as broken pieces of concrete, twisted metal, and discarded fragments of building materials.

Near the top of the slope, there's a chain-link fence that appears to demarcate the boundary of a more controlled area. Beyond this fence, there is a prominent red brick building with a hipped roof, which looks relatively well-maintained compared to the surrounding landscape. The buildingâ€™s architecture suggests it might serve an industrial or utility function. 

The composition of the image portrays a stark contrast between the natural flow of the river and the human-inflicted damage upon its banks, highlighting themes of pollution and environmental neglect. The sunlight and clear blue sky offer a natural beauty that is overshadowed by the impact of human waste, which dominates the scene. The photo may evoke feelings of concern and a call for responsible environmental management.
title: Broken curbstones and sidewalks are dumped on the river bank behind the waterworks in suburban Fridley.
